comment: Class for the HTML report for a BaliTestSuite
constructorsignature: Function New(outputLoc As String) As BaliTestSuiteReport
commenthtml: Class for the HTML report for a BaliTestSuite

methods.label: New
methods.signature: Function New(outputLoc As String) As BaliTestSuiteReport

arguments.label: outputLoc
arguments.comment: Directory to write the HTML or XML report to

methods.label: printoutReport
methods.comment: Write out the actual HTML report
methods.codesample:
Sub completeReport()
    
    Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuiteReport(Me.outputLoc)
    Call testSuite.printoutReport(Me)
    
End Sub
methods.codesamplehtml: Sub completeReport()&lt;br /&gt;    &lt;br /&gt;    Dim testSuite as New BaliTestSuiteReport(Me.outputLoc)&lt;br /&gt;    Call testSuite.printoutReport(Me)&lt;br /&gt;    &lt;br /&gt;End Sub
methods.commenthtml: Write out the actual HTML report
